q: Tuesday signed his first endorsement deal since serving 18 months in federal prison. The athlete signed a two-year contract with gridiron padding producer Unequal Technologies( UT), according to the Associated Press. We're real excited about it, UT chief executive officer Rob Vito said. " Michael Vick is good people. He paid his dues. Barack Obama reached out to him. He deserves an opportunity.
